about_the_game:
Hello Streamers
Welcome to the sampling of Scared Tube
Where you, the lucky new influencer, may taste four of Scared Tubes, delicious ghost. Lightly charred inside of a cabin befitting of a Demo. Enjoy Scared Tubes ghost hunting gear, like fan favorite EMF, Note Pad, and who can forget the Thermometer. There is a plethora to sample, and to ensure you can, we will include 5,000 Scared Bucks. But remember, this sample delicacy is for you and you alone, so that means you can't dress up in Scared Tubes, Character Customization Room, Nor Play with Friends, and most importantly, your level and followers will not grow with you. We do hope this sample will entice you to order the full Six Corse Meal of Character Customizations, Single Player, Multiplayer, Several Ghost and their different animation, Several Huge Levels, and More Updates Coming.
detailed_description:
Hello Streamers
Welcome to the sampling of Scared Tube
Where you, the lucky new influencer, may taste four of Scared Tubes, delicious ghost. Lightly charred inside of a cabin befitting of a Demo. Enjoy Scared Tubes ghost hunting gear, like fan favorite EMF, Note Pad, and who can forget the Thermometer. There is a plethora to sample, and to ensure you can, we will include 5,000 Scared Bucks. But remember, this sample delicacy is for you and you alone, so that means you can't dress up in Scared Tubes, Character Customization Room, Nor Play with Friends, and most importantly, your level and followers will not grow with you. We do hope this sample will entice you to order the full Six Corse Meal of Character Customizations, Single Player, Multiplayer, Several Ghost and their different animation, Several Huge Levels, and More Updates Coming.
name: Scared Tube Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 375
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Hello Streamers Thank you for checking out the Scared Tube Demo, where you can get a glimpse of the game as a single player, test out the game gear, and try to find out what four ghosts are in the game. But more will come with the Full Version.
